# basic_find
Basic find program, cut-down version of unix ‘find’.
Walks a file hierarchy.

- [x] find . -name ‘*.txt’
- [x] find temp -type f
- [x] find . -type d
- [ ] find . -name '*.rb' -exec rm {} \;


Run as follows:

- [x] python -m basic_find . -name ‘*.txt’
- [x] python -m basic_find temp -type f
- [x] python -m basic_find . -type d
